snippet: Many priests in the Diocese of Kansas City-St. Joseph have lost confidence in Bishop Robert W. Finn since he was convicted for not reporting a pedophile under his supervision.
abstract: Survey by company working for Roman Catholic diocese in Kansas City, Mo, finds significant number of priests have lost confidence in bishop Robert W Finn, who was convicted of failing to report pedophile priest under his supervision; survey raises question of whether Finn can successfully continue to oversee diocese.

byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and LAURIE GOODSTEIN

lead_paragraph: Many priests in the Diocese of Kansas City-St. Joseph have lost confidence in Bishop Robert W. Finn since he was convicted for not reporting a pedophile under his supervision.

headline.seo: Bishop Robert Finn Criticized for Not Reporting Priest
headline.main: Missouri Bishop’s Conviction Leaves Clergy Divided
headline.print_headline: With Bishop Convicted, His Priests Are Divided
